definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Strange meson production in heavy ion collisions has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 我们研究了重离子碰撞中的奇异介子产生。

sentences.english: The straight line signature of cosmic ray muons disappears underground.
sentences.chinese: 直线签字宇宙射线μ介子消失地下。

sentences.english: However, Jie declined his invitation, preferring to lead a hermit's life with his mother in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 惟独介子椎拒绝接受封赏，他带了母亲隐居绵山。

sentences.english: The mediation subflows are run within the context of their parent flows.
sentences.chinese: 中介子流在其父流的上下文中运行。

sentences.english: Explain the theory of relativity dealing with heavy mesons are more reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 说明相对论处理重介子更为合理。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the pions quickly decay into mu mesons , or muons , which penetrate to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 同时，介子会快速衰变成缈子抵达地面。

sentences.english: So, that influence of field from space and it can control meson surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 因此，空间的影响它能控制介子环境。

sentences.english: For heavy- mesons , the model also gives results consisted with experiments.
sentences.chinese: 对重介子系统研究结果与实验也基本符合一致。

sentences.english: In this thesis we study the nuclear matter using the quark-meson coupling model (QMC).
sentences.chinese: 本文用夸克介子耦合模型研究核物质。

sentences.english: One option we'll discuss later is to use mediation subflows.
sentences.chinese: 我们稍后讨论的一种选择就是使用中介子流。

sentences.english: Two photons are created in the decay of the neutral pion.
sentences.chinese: 双光子是在中性兀介子衰变中产生的。

sentences.english: Scientists agree that Pion antimatter powered spacecraft may approach the speed of light.
sentences.chinese: 科学家认为，介子反物质动力飞船可能接近光的速度。

sentences.english: Purchase all upgrades for the Meson Collider.
sentences.chinese: 购买所有升级介子对撞机。

sentences.english: But he forgot about Jie Zitui who had cut a piece of flesh from his leg.
sentences.chinese: 但是他却忘记了曾从自己腿上割肉给他吃的介子推。

sentences.english: But they could also be easily mistaken for the far more common muon.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们也可能被错认为更常见的μ介子。

sentences.english: Particles, such as pi-mesons, requiring symmetric wave functions are called bosons .
sentences.chinese: 要求对称波函数的粒子，如介子，叫做玻色子。

definition: Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
